description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You bend light and background vibrations around yourself, either through expertise or a bit of technological ingenuity, allowing you to avoid detection. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Invisible] for 10 minutes. This makes you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Undetected] to all creatures, though creatures can attempt to find you, making you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Hidden] instead. If you use a hostile action, the effect ends after that hostile action is completed. While your Cloaking Field is active, security cameras, sentries, and other surveillance don't detect you unless they possess special senses that normally see through invisibility.
